author.name: Marek Marecki
message:
This issue takes too long to close.

I need new features in the assembler *now* and I can't wait until I have
enough time to rewrite the whole pipeline (lexer, parser, static
analyser, type checker, code emitter) and then apply the required
changes to the new code.

The code was merged into 'devel' branch (it is completely separate from
the old code - they share nothing) and will be worked on on "as time
allows" basis.
